hi and welcome you listening to the x-22

this is what the central banks are
really afraid of let's get into the

said they expected bankruptcy filings in

filing and we can see right now they're
expecting the bankruptcies to surpass

thousands of stores are being closed

going to be around 12,000 retail stores

is how bad it is out in the retail space
and it's just getting worse the reason

Trump has come into office the things
that he is doing is not to improve the
economy that we are in today that's not

prepare the country for the transition
into a new currency
into a new economic realm that's what
he's doing right now and what you need
to do is you need to start the process
of bringing back manufacturing I mean
think about it
the central banker is the deep state
they've been moving manufacturing out of

we are we need to set up deals to bring
at least some of them back here or to

in this country because what's going to

we have to figure out how to trade with

also have to stop foreign entities from

created an executive order this
executive order just didn't stop this
one deal it went much much further than

foreign takeovers of US tech companies
this is what the order said there is
credible evidence that leads me to

Broadcom Corporation in California
corporation and Broadcom came in LP and
Cayman Islands limited partnership and
their partners subsidies or affiliates
through exercising control of Qualcomm
incorporated a Delaware corporation
might take action that threatens to
impair the national security of the

this executive order will crush any

trying to capture and control US

so there's no foreign takeovers

something we don't like having their

now
up to now a hundred thousand answers of
the precious metal stored in London
which is in total worth about 33 billion
or 130 million dollars of current gold

of globe reserves out of the country is

those who have gold well they're the

the back the currency by gold as long as

there's problems we have the gold this

they've been amassing a huge amount of

getting the idea that Trump along with

so the Rothschilds aren't really

I think this is what they're preparing

you hear
trade war because the only way to reset

system because if we don't bring down

this
because their system allows different

because there's a lot of sanctions on

now a new york capital management

and they're gonna call it the petro

very interesting I do believe most
likely the central banks are behind this

not thin air and will remain more price

circumventing some tax reporting

like the banking system is trying to
create something to get Vince everyone
that this is a stable cryptocurrency now
they're pushing the idea that this
outside of the banking system but I
think they're doing this to get people
into it and we're gonna have to watch it
very carefully because if it is truly
not with the banking system and they're
starting this up it means that we see
something else happening here but we
need to watch that very very carefully
because the central banks they came out
and they actually broadcasted what
they're really afraid of remember a
couple years ago about 2012 2013 the
beylin documents were created because
what happened in 2008 they were bailouts
government said no more bailouts we are
done with that so they created bailing
documents and they experimented in

know answers and stuff like that and we
know that if or when the system comes
down and they shut down the banks called

much cash you can take out from inside

control the currency within the bank now
their biggest worry right now is bank

do is we need to start getting rid of
cash this is why there was a big push to
say we don't need cash anymore and of
course they wanted to go to all digital
and I'm not talking about cryptocurrency
digital they wanted to go to Fiat
Digital which they can control widgets
which is which that currency is
centralized so they're worried about
bank runs now think about this for some
for a second the Bank of International
Settlements said the following those
looking to develop and launch a wholly
digital currency should carefully weigh
the implications of doing so especially
as they relate to monetary policy and
overall stability in some the biz noted
that a currency of the nature
might be useful for payments but more
work is needed to assess the full
potential a general purpose CB DC could
give rise to higher instability of
commercial bank deposit funding even if
designed primarily with payment purpose
in mind in periods of stress or flight
towards the central bank may occur on a
fast and large scale challenging
commercial banks and the central bank to
manage such situations would be very
difficult there could be a situation in
which banks even stronger ones could
face issues during bank runs thanks to
the ease at which depositors could move
their funds by way of the digital
currency think about what they're saying
before crypto currencies you could only
transfer your currency from bank to bank

solved that problem because they would

another banking system not a real not
really a big deal now we introduce

the banking system when the system

something is going wrong they don't have
to rush to the bank they don't have to
drunk get in their car drive to the bank
stand on line try to get their cash out
which they just won't be able to do all
they need to do is go into the computer
and transfer the funds to an exchange
click of a button
boom the cash now is removed from the
account it's in exchange and all they
have to do is then purchase a
cryptocurrency that's how fast this
could happen and they're very nervous
that when
there is a bank run because the banking

afraid that people will do this and they
should be afraid because that's what
everyone is going to do those people who

or bit tricks or crack in or any of the

transferred into the exchange and then
you can purchase any cryptocurrency
from that point as long as the exchange
handles the cryptocurrency you want and
they're very nervous about this and
they're trying to figure out what they
can do about this and this is why
they're demonizing cryptocurrency so
much this is why they're saying that

can't be used as currency
you should really stay away from it this
is why they're continually saying it's
